message: excellent. hope i get a chance to come back this year :)
You can find a bit more info on it here: http://thestrangeloop.com/blog/11/01/27/strange-loop-2011
oh man, going to a game would be great!
yep, that should be fun.  the hotel is just a few steps from the ballpark, so that should be easy
nice, do we get to give talks in the ballpark? :-)
Strange Loop 2011 will be held Sept. 18-20th in St. Louis at the Hilton at the Ballpark in downtown St. Louis
we do plan to buy a block of tickets for the game on the 20th though

I put in a request for a group block of tickets today for the Cardinals game Sept 20th (vs Mets).  These will be an optional extra during registration till they're gone, probably at or slightly below cost, assuming they approve my request.
just bought a block of tickets in section 337 1st-base pavilion for Sept 20th - I'll make these available at or below cost during registration
